Cabin interior in Gol, Norway. Proud of the way it came out given the different lights in the view.

1 Aug 2023

As per my privacy policy, I won't know you've been here unless you tell me. Let me know what you think about this either via email, Mastodon or webmention. I would love to hear from you!

ZinzyWaleson Geene is an Afropean queer IndieWeb advocate living in Amsterdam (The Netherlands) and working as a Senior UX practitioner at Gerimedica.
